overview:
Two New iPhone Apps Keep Kids Reading All Summer

The Reading Game and Reading for Kids: 100 Ways to Encourage Your Kids to Read are the perfect summer companions to kids and their parents â€“ especially if the kids want to go back to school with great reading skills!

The Reading Game makes reading books more exciting and fun than ever before! The Reading Game tracks your kids’ progress as they read books outside of the app. With over 100 rewards to unlock, this game transforms daily reading into kids’ favorite thing!
